extDesc.message: A user-friendly image viewer to help you to focus on the images in a web page without being distracted by other things.

noImage.description: Displayed in the center of screen if no appropriate image found.

prevImage.description: Tooltips for the button which shows previous image.

nextImage.description: Tooltips for the button which shows next image.

prevPage.description: Tooltips for the button which shows previous page.

nextPage.description: Tooltips for the button which shows next page.

usage.message:
F2:  Open/Close
Esc: Close
<-:  Previous Image
->:  Next Image
CTRL+<-: Previous Page
CTRL+->: Next Page
usage.description: Help message for the usage of this extension.
